means: 得到或接受某部分东西

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词或词组均含"参加，加入"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: attend, join, participate, take part in
means: attend ：侧重参加或出席会议或学术活动等。
join ：普通用词，指加入党派、团体或游戏活动等。
participate ：正式用词，特指参加团体活动，暗示以一个积极的角色参加。
take part in ：侧重参加某项群众性、集体性的事业、工作或活动，突出参加者在其中发挥一定的作用。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个动词均含有"分享，分担"之意。
means: share ： 普通用词，指与他人共同享受拥有或共同使用某物，或共同承担某项工作或费用等。

sentence.Network_en: This in effect denied them their right to participate meaningfully in elections.
sentence.Network_cn: 这实际上是剥夺了他们正式参与选举的权利。

sentence.Network_en: Over half the population of this country participate in sport.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个国家一半以上的人口参加体育锻炼。

sentence.Network_en: The US was ready to train its troops to participate.
sentence.Network_cn: 美国准备训练军队参加。

list.abs: ...侈的拍摄习惯从未改变，没人能理解为什么。《游戏时间》中最后那场大饭店的戏，塔蒂连每把椅子的靠背设计都参与了。《交通意外》中有一场戏需要一个少妇抱着婴儿，在塔蒂的设计中，这个婴儿的轮廓一定要与这位少妇的身形和肤色相匹配，并且在视觉上造成一种喜剧效果，这不过是一个很传统的喜剧包袱，但工作人员始终找不到这样一对符合条件的母子。于是塔蒂宣布停工，自己找遍了荷兰的妇产医院。当时的制片人古斯塔夫·道格拉斯（Gustaf Douglas）问塔蒂的助手，塔蒂的工作为什么这么慢？他得到的回答就永远是：为了巴塔维亚的婴

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent.: from Latin participat- 'shared in', from the verb participare, based on pars, part- 'part' + capere 'take'

encyclopedia.content: participate 英[pɑ:'tisipeit]美[pɑ:'tisipeit] v. [I] 1.参加，参与(+in) 2.分享，分担(+in/with) 3.含有，带有(+of) v. [T] 1.分享，分担 v. [I] 1.参加，参与(+in) 2.分享，分担(+in/with) 3.含有，带有(+of) v. [T] 1.分享，分担 时 态：participated,participating,participates 名 词：partic'ipa'tor 形容词：partic'ipa'tive 同反义词 词义辨析 attend，join，partici

entry.def: If you participate in an activity, you take part in it.

example.ex: They expected him to participate in the ceremony...
Over half the population of this country participate in sport.
example.tran: 这个国家一半以上的人口参加体育锻炼。

means.word_mean: 2. become a participant; be involved in;

stems_affixes.word_buile: muni社区+cip拿,抓,握住+al……的→抓社区管理的
prin主要的+cip拿,抓,握住+al……的→被抓住了的重要的→主要的
anticipate[v.预料;预期]+ion状态→anticipation预期
emancipate[v.解放]+ion动作或状态→emancipation解放
part部分+cip拿,抓,握住+ant……人→抓住成为部分→参与者

stems_affixes.value_cn: 法则, 原则, 原理

anti=ante前+cip拿,抓,握住+ate表动词→向前抓住→预料

de分开+part部分,分开→部分分开→离开
im无+partial有偏见的→无偏见的

Sentence.sentence: Both are critical to producing citizens who can participate effectively in our democratic society, become innovative（创新的)leaders, and benefit from the spiritual enrichment that the reflection on the great ideas of mankind over time provides.
participate in discussions with classmates and Facebook friends.
Of the teenagers who participated in the survey, 49% said that libraries are where they get most of their books.
A lot of contestants participated in the show
The rush to distribute the devices worries some professors, who say that students are less likely to participate in class if they are multi-tasking.

sentences.en: Several experts will participate as technical advisers.
sentences.cn: 几位专家将作为技术顾问参加。

sentences.en: The teacher participated the students' games.
sentences.cn: 老师参加了学生们的游戏。

jushi.english: Several experts will participate as technical advisers.
jushi.chinese: 几位专家将作为技术顾问参加。

jushi.english: Yesterday there was a sports meet in our school with hundreds of students participating.
jushi.chinese: 昨天我校举行了运动会,有几百名学生参加。

jushi.english: The editorial participates of the tone of official statement.
jushi.chinese: 这篇社论带有官方明显的口吻。
